page.title: 09Health in Arundel
page.content: There is a surgery at the bottom of Torton Hill Road. It has three doctors and a district nurse. Patients go to the{surgery}and the doctors also visit patients at home. There is a surgery every weekday and on Saturdays in emergency. An extension to the waiting room has just been added and in there are toys, magazines,comics etc. and a noticeboard showing local information and forthcoming events. There is a small{cottage hospital} built on ground given to the people of Arundel by the late Duke of Norfolk. It has 18 beds in 2 wards, 4 side rooms, a small operating theatre for casualties and a new physiotherapy department recently opened by Princess Alexandra. There are {social workers}who look after any social problems.
